title: Maxine Waters says legislators ‘very close’ to a deal on stablecoins: Report
description:
"We worked something out with the feds, and I think it's OK,” Waters said of the stablecoin bill.

United States lawmakers are reportedly closing in on passing a long-awaited stablecoin bill.

"We're working on stablecoin; we're getting very close," Representative Maxine Waters reportedly told Politico on Feb. 7.

"We're very, very close — very close,” she stressed.

Read more

title: Polygon’s (MATIC) Competitor at Just $0.01 Raises Over $4 Million in Presale
description: The world of cryptocurrency continues to expand with new and exciting projects entering the market. title: 38% Chainlink Rally Incoming if LINK Breaks Through This Stiff Resistance Level, Says Crypto Analyst
description:
Crypto analyst and trader Ali Martinez believes Chainlink (LINK) could soon move another leg up. Martinez tells his 42,400 followers on the social media platform X that the decentralized oracle network Chainlink could break through a key resistance level and soar to $26.87. “Chainlink faces stiff resistance between $19.40 and $20.03, where 5,330 addresses hold […]
